xuiRadio
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for HTML radio input. Like a standard input [type="radio"], this component represents only a single option.

Usage

as element:
<xui-radio
       name="{string}"
       ng-model="{string}"
       value="{string}"
       title="{string}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}"
       is-required="{boolean}"
       title="{string}"
       help-text="{string}">
</xui-radio>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
namestring

The name of the element.

ng-modelstring

The model that the radio buttons are bound to.

valuestring

String value of this radio button. It allows only one-time binding.

titlestring

Value to be shown as a tooltip.

is-disabledboolean

Expression to determine if the radio button should be disabled.

is-requiredboolean

All radio buttons are required by default. If you want conditional validation then supply a boolean expression to this attribute.

titlestring

Title of the radio button.

help-textstring

Help text for the radio button.
